sentences.en: " Ha , ha, " he exclaimed softly, as if to himself, " that's funny. "
sentences.cn: “ 哈哈, " 他轻声叫了起来, 像是在自言自语, " 这太让人发笑了.

sentences.en: " Ha ha ! You must have found out about it, then!
sentences.cn: “ 哈,哈, 那么你打听到了.

sentences.en: "Ha, ha," everyone guffawed. "It's one of Viv's shock tactics."
sentences.cn: “哈哈，”所有人都大笑起来，“这是维夫的一招出奇制胜的战术。”

sentences.en: "Ha!" It was a cross between a laugh and a bark.
sentences.cn: “哈！”那声音听起来既像在笑又像在叫。

sentences.en: Ah ain'never seed ha'r dat color in mah life.
sentences.cn: 我可一辈子也没见过这样颜色的头发.

sentences.en: Ha, Shousheng , of course you're joking? "
sentences.cn: 哈, 寿生, 你是说笑话罢? ”

sentences.en: Ha! I thought it might be you hiding there!
sentences.cn: 哈！我想可能就是你藏在那里！

sentences.en: Ha! said Wren. Think I'd trust you?
sentences.cn: “哈！”雷恩说，“你以为我会相信你？”

sentences.en: He said "vegetarians unite", and I looked at him and said "yeah, ha ha".
sentences.cn: “我行我‘素’，”他说道，我瞅着他，说：“随你喽，呵呵。”

sentences.en: Maybe ALL the Temperance Taverns have got a ha'nted room, hey, Huck? "
sentences.cn: 也许所有的禁酒客栈都有个闹鬼的房间, 喂, 哈克,你说是不是? ”

sentences.en: Schulman is a little tired of the hoo-ha about the all-women team.
sentences.cn: 舒尔曼有点厌烦了对全女子队的过度炒作。

sentences.en: Steve, your face is all full of paint. Ha! Ha! Ha!
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫, 你的脸上都是油漆.哈! 哈! 哈!

sentences.en: Well, you can't clear yourself now , ha , ha!
sentences.cn: 今天你是洗不清了, 哈哈!

words.tran_cn: 哈！（表示惊异，愉快，怀疑，胜利等）

trans.tran_en: used when you are surprised or have discovered something interesting
used when you are surprised or have discovered something interesting
